name: Join 'em
description:
Join 'em was made for the 5th GMTK game jam.

This is my first ever game that is more than a prototype. This is also my first ever game jam so that is pretty cool. I know that it's not the prettiest thing in the world but i am proud of it, learned a lot and, had a good time so that is good enough for me :)

If you have any feedback, things i should do or any constructive criticism. TELL ME!!!

WHAT TO DO:

In Join 'em what you have to do is gather resources and make them into certain objects.
